messages.title: YOU AND THE LIBERAL DEMOCRATS CAN!
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats introduced free school meals for all 5 to 7 year olds. The Liberal Democrats want to put 1p for Extra on income tax to raise £6 billion for the NHS and social care services. The Liberal Democrats are standing up to Theresa May’s unfair 'Dementia Tax'. They are fighting Tory plans to take the houses of people who need social care.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats introduced free school meals for all 5 to 7 year olds.
The Liberal Democrats want to put 1p for Extra on income tax to raise £6 billion for the NHS and social care services.
The Liberal Democrats are standing up to Theresa May’s unfair 'Dementia Tax'.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Voting for Labour here in Colchester will just let the Tories win and allow Theresa May to make more damaging cuts. Labour were 11,000 votes behind last time. They are out of the race this time and bookies have put their odds at 150/1.

issues.health: The Liberal Democrats want to put 1p for Extra on income tax to raise £6 billion for the NHS and social care services. The Liberal Democrats are standing up to Theresa May’s unfair 'Dementia Tax'.

community.content: The Lib Dems want to protect and invest in the NHS and social care services which help us all.

contactInformation.address: Magtelen Hall, Wimpole Road, Colchester CO1 2DE

quotes.text: 'The Tories’ social care plan is a death tax by another name'
